mapper.sql: id, execute_date_plan AS executeDatePlan, begin_date_plan AS beginDatePlan, end_date_plan AS endDatePlan, shop_id AS shopId, shop_name AS shopName, course_id AS courseId, course_name AS courseName, type, coach_id AS coachId, coach_name AS coachName, room_id AS roomId, room_name AS roomName, reserve_total_num AS reserveTotalNum, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, status, assistant_name AS assistantName, assistant_id AS assistantId, is_use AS isUse, sdaduim_id AS sdaduimId, sdaduim_name AS sdaduimName, create_user_id AS createUserId, CustomerCode, create_user_name AS createUserName, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_user_name AS updateUserName, reserve_type as reserveType
mapper.select: SELECT pi.ID coachId, pi.RelName coachName, pi.Mobile coachMobile, pi.Sex coachSex, pi.JobNumber coachJobNumber, (select count(1) from fr_education_client_info eci where eci.education_id = edu.id and eci.reserve_status = 1 and eci.is_use = 1) eduCurrentCount, edu.id eduId, edu.begin_date_plan eduBeginDate, edu.end_date_plan eduEndDate, edu.shop_name shopName, edu.course_id courseId, edu.course_name courseName, /* edu.coach_id coachId, edu.coach_name coachName,*/ edu.reserve_total_num reserveTotalNum, edu.assistant_name assistantName, edu.assistant_id assistantId FROM PersonnelInfo pi LEFT JOIN PersonlRole pr ON pi.id = pr.PersonnelInfoId LEFT JOIN RoleInfo ri ON pr.RoleInfoId = ri.Id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM fr_education edu WHERE edu.execute_date_plan = #{executeDate} AND edu.type = ${teachType} AND edu.status = 0 AND edu.is_use = 1 AND edu.sdaduim_id = #{sdaduimId}) edu ON edu.coach_id = pi.id WHERE ri.UserType = 3 AND ri.ISTeach = 1 AND edu.CustomerCode = #{CustomerCode} AND pi.ShopId= #{shopId} AND pi.IsDel = 0 ORDER BY edu.execute_date_plan ASC

SELECT pi.ID coachId, pi.RelName coachName, pi.Mobile coachMobile, pi.Sex coachSex, pi.JobNumber coachJobNumber, gcr.id roomId, gcrs.id roomSeatId, gcr.name roomName, gcrs.seat_num seatNum, gcrs.cnt_col colNUm, gcrs.cnt_row rowNUm, /* gcr.contain_num allowMemberNum,*/ (select count(1) from fr_education_client_info eci where eci.education_id = edu.id and eci.reserve_status = 1 and eci.is_use = 1) eduCurrentCount, edu.id eduId, edu.begin_date_plan eduBeginDate, edu.end_date_plan eduEndDate, edu.shop_name shopName, edu.course_id courseId, edu.course_name courseName, /* edu.coach_id coachId, edu.coach_name coachName,*/ edu.reserve_total_num reserveTotalNum, edu.assistant_name assistantName, edu.assistant_id assistantId FROM fr_group_class_room_seat gcrs LEFT JOIN fr_group_class_room gcr ON gcrs.class_room_id = gcr.id LEFT JOIN fr_education edu ON edu.room_id = gcr.id left join PersonnelInfo pi on edu.coach_id = pi.id WHERE edu.shop_id = #{shopId} AND edu.sdaduim_id = #{sdaduimId} AND edu.CustomerCode = #{CustomerCode} AND gcr.is_using = 1 AND gcrs.is_using = 1 AND edu.execute_date_plan = #{executeDate} AND edu.type = ${teachType} AND edu.status = 0 AND edu.is_use = 1

SELECT pi.ID coachId, pi.RelName coachName, pi.Mobile coachMobile, pi.Sex coachSex, pi.JobNumber coachJobNumber, gcr.id roomId, gcrs.id roomSeatId, gcr.name roomName, gcrs.seat_num seatNum, gcrs.cnt_col colNUm, gcrs.cnt_row rowNUm, (select count(1) from fr_education_client_info eci where eci.education_id = edu.id and eci.reserve_status = 1 and eci.is_use = 1) eduCurrentCount, edu.id eduId, edu.begin_date_plan eduBeginDate, edu.end_date_plan eduEndDate, edu.shop_name shopName, edu.course_id courseId, edu.course_name courseName, /* edu.coach_id coachId, edu.coach_name coachName,*/ edu.reserve_total_num reserveTotalNum, edu.assistant_name assistantName, edu.assistant_id assistantId FROM fr_education edu LEFT JOIN fr_group_class_room gcr on edu.room_id = gcr.id LEFT JOIN fr_group_class_room_seat gcrs ON gcrs.class_room_id = gcr.id left join PersonnelInfo pi on edu.coach_id = pi.id WHERE edu.shop_id = #{shopId} AND edu.sdaduim_id = #{sdaduimId} AND edu.CustomerCode = #{CustomerCode} AND gcr.is_using = 1 AND gcrs.is_using = 1 AND edu.execute_date_plan >= #{executeBeginDate} AND edu.execute_date_plan <= #{executeEndDate} AND edu.type = ${teachType} AND edu.status = 0 AND edu.is_use = 1
